articles.title: Wegovy has potentially deadly side effect, scientists warn - Daily Mail
articles.description: Researchers in China believe Wegovy may cause a person's small intestine to become enlarged, which puts them at high risk of a potentially deadly obstruction in their digestive system.
articles.content:

articles.title: Look up! Full worm moon will appear in the morning sky TOMORROW - Daily Mail
articles.description: A full worm moon will peak at 7:40 am ET, beaming brightly until Wednesday morning. The nickname comes from comes from how the ground would thaw, allowing earthworms to appear.
